MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Broom Farm Steading and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.15am. The engineers have advised there is broken overhead line equipment in the local area. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.15pm.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated 11.25am on Tuesday 23rd February 2021.
